title: Geth will not terminate on Windows x64
body:
Seemed to do nothing for many hours so I ctrl-C'd.

Not terminated after a further half hour. Using 0 CPU (so not a duplicate of #1892) and memory occupancy per task manager is not deceasing (162MB) so I decided to Ctrl-C 9 more times. Output below.

```
I0211 03:16:14.901927    9776 blockchain.go:1243] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 1 txs in 7.0004ms. #985779 [dd43f607 /
dd43f607]
```
